lyrics.text: Lesson 4, The Double Life of Alfred Blogs.
lyrics.translation: 第四课，阿尔弗雷德·布洛格斯的双重生活。

lyrics.text: Listen to the tape, then answer the question below.
lyrics.translation: 听录音，然后回答下面的问题。

lyrics.text: Why did Alf want a white collar job?
lyrics.translation: 为什么Alf想要一份白领工作？

lyrics.text: These days, people who do manual work often receive far more money than people who work
lyrics.translation: 这些天，从事体力劳动的人往往比从事脑力劳动的人获得更多的报酬。

lyrics.text: in offices.
lyrics.translation: 在办公室里。

lyrics.text: People who work in offices are frequently referred to as white collar workers for the
lyrics.translation: 在办公室工作的人通常被称为白领工人，因为

lyrics.text: simple reason that they usually wear a collar and tie to go to work.
lyrics.translation: 一个简单的原因是他们通常穿带领带的衣服去上班。

lyrics.text: Such is human nature that a great many people are often willing to sacrifice higher pay
lyrics.translation: 人性就是这样，很多人常常愿意牺牲更高的薪酬

lyrics.text: for the privilege of becoming white collar workers.
lyrics.translation: 为了成为白领工人的特权。

lyrics.text: This can give rise to curious situations as it did in the case of Alfred Blogs who worked
lyrics.translation: 这可能会导致一些奇怪的情况，就像阿尔弗雷德·布洛格斯的案例一样，他工作时

lyrics.text: as a dustman for the Ellesmere Corporation.
lyrics.translation: 作为埃尔斯米尔公司的清洁工。

lyrics.text: When he got married, Alf was too embarrassed to say anything to his wife about his job.
lyrics.translation: 当他结婚时，阿尔夫太尴尬了，以至于无法对他的妻子谈论他的工作。

lyrics.text: He simply told her that he worked for the corporation.
lyrics.translation: 他只是告诉她，他在公司工作。

lyrics.text: Every morning, he left home dressed in a smart black suit.
lyrics.translation: 每天早上，他都会穿着一套整洁的黑色西装离开家。

lyrics.text: He then changed into overalls and spent the next eight hours as a dustman.
lyrics.translation: 然后他换上了工作服，接下来的八小时作为一名清洁工。

lyrics.text: Before returning home at night, he took a shower and changed back into his suit.
lyrics.translation: 在晚上回家之前，他洗了个澡，然后换回了他的西装。

lyrics.text: Alf did this for over two years and his fellow dustman kept his secret.
lyrics.translation: Alf 这样做了两年多，他的清洁工同伴保守了他的秘密。

lyrics.text: Alf's wife has never discovered that she married a dustman and she never will, for Alf has
lyrics.translation: 阿尔夫的妻子从未发现她嫁给了一个清洁工，她也永远不会发现，因为阿尔夫

lyrics.text: just found another job.
lyrics.translation: 刚刚找到了另一份工作。

lyrics.text: He will soon be working in an office.
lyrics.translation: 他很快将在办公室工作。

lyrics.text: He will be earning only half as much as he used to, but he feels that his rise in status
lyrics.translation: 他的收入将只有他过去收入的一半，但他觉得自己的地位提高了

lyrics.text: is well worth the loss of money.
lyrics.translation: 非常值得损失金钱。

lyrics.text: From now on, he will wear a suit all day and others will call him Mr. Blogs, not Alf.
lyrics.translation: 从现在开始，他将整天穿着西装，别人会称呼他为布洛格斯先生，而不是阿尔夫。
